name: bright-early-leaf-us-alone-edition
title: Bright & Early: Leaf Us Alone Edition
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
We’re running short on time this morning, so you know the drill:

  • Both Vince Young and Kerry Collins have been sidelined with injuries this week, which does not bode well for Sunday’s matchup against the Eagles. [City Paper]
  • The City of Franklin decided to turn several of their playing fields pink for Breast Cancer Awareness month. [WKRN]
  • The Murfreesboro Water and Sewage Department was found to be responsible for dumping raw sewage into Stones River recently and now they have to shell out $16,000 to reimburse the city for cleanup costs. [WTVF]
  • Nashville internet just got a little bit faster. [Post Business]
  • The Dogs in Restaurants bill passed the Metro Council Tuesday night with a vote of 32-3. [City Paper]
  • The Murfreesboro mosque hearing gets more interesting by the day. [Tennessean]
  • Tennessee has secured a $1 million grant to prevent teen pregnancy for teens in foster care. [WZTV]

Photo by jodestick.
